quote: And you can always count on her in the end
author: Azusa Nakano

quote: We can all visit the temple together
author: Azusa Nakano

quote: Calm down, Mugi-senpai, don’t throw a tantrum. You too, Yui-senpai, you can’t start crying like a baby
author: Azusa Nakano

quote: And you can always cout on her in the end
author: Azusa Nakano
